## Workspace.getWidth() method

Returns the horizontal offset of the workspace. Intended for LTR/RTL compatibility in XML. Not relevant for a headless workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getWidth(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

Width.
